name: Tara Flowers
text: They still have beautiful flowers for sale. Very few Bonnie plants. They also have plenty of seeds but if you are looking for collards or turnips look elsewhere.

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Looking for great plants for your garden this summer?  Home Depot at Crestwood Festival Center even has heirloom varieties of tomato plants you will not find other places.

name: Alex Fedel
text: They lack integrity; driver drove fully loaded forklift over 2 clearly visible sprinkler valve boxes causing $1K in damage. Owner refused to return calls or make situation right.  Contrary to other reviews my sod was terrible so providing picture as proof.  You decide, in my case cheapest got me property damage, water, and weed duty.

name: Lucian Mullins
text: I ordered 18 pallets of Bermuda they delivered when they said they would and I ordered 5 more a few weeks later delivered when they said and my yard looks great excellent place to buy from.

name: J G
text: I had a great experience with Metro-Turf. Tom  was just wonderful, did everything he said he would do and in a very timely manner. The grass we got looked exceptionally good. It looks great in our yard. Overall experience was great. I highly recommend this company for your sod needs.

name: Seth Nicholson
text: Super awesome!

name: Chris Willingham
text: Very tight place especially if your making a delivery in a 63' truck here. Place is very easy to pass by as well so you need to pay attention.

name: Jimmy Owen
text: Promised delivery but did not do as promised. Gave several excuses that was later confirmed as inaccurate. Had other positive experience but last one was complete run-around. Pot luck as to service you will receive.

name: Creation Carpentry
text: I called about everyone on the list of sod farms near me. I only found one cheaper place per pallet of centipede but they charged more for shipping. Overall for the number of pallets I bought I got a great deal. Erin that took my order was very helpful and professional. The driver delivered the pallets and placed them where I needed them which in itself is not a big deal but I have a driveway that is long and not well built for a semi to get down.  I appreciate the promptness and the professionalism I received.

name: donna carroll
text: Awesome people. Beautiful grass

name: James Shoub
text: Friendly people always helpful

name: Kim McCrae
text: Grass 4 days

name: Nick Cogman
text: love it

name: Genaro Parra
text: Hated it

name: V Boice
text: Worst sod I have ever seen

name: L B
text:
(Translated by Google) Good plsc

(Original)
Good plsc

name: Rhodeah2010
text: Great selection of landscape rocks and the service was excellent — very pleased with how our project turned out!

name: Martin Bachtel
text: Woerner is great.  They have an excellent tightly-knit staff that works well together.   It is my number one go-to place for sod.  They have the best combined prices on pallets and delivery in the metro.  I can’t say enough good things about the Tif Tuf Bermuda that they offer.  They also have a huge array of shrubs and trees.

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Andrew McCurry
text: Always willing to help load you up and get you out the door fast. That is important when you are trying to run a production based business.  Knowledgeable friendly staff. Great selection of plants and stone.

name: Er Tu2
text: I have always received prompt and courteous service from the knowledgeable staff. Highly recommended.

name: Joaquin Maldonado
text: Good place

name: Taylor Hardscapes
text: The management and staff at Woerner Landscaping are incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. Fantastic customer service you won't get anywhere else. Great selection and pricing.

name: Eric Beavers
text: Wide selection, knowledgeable & helpful staff. Convenient to Jefferson Shelby area. Delivery for larger  orders.

name: Jason Ciccarelli
text: Great people

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Ben Thomas
text: Great customer service and tons of knowledge.  The entire team there is top-notch. If you're looking for plants or hardscape material,  Woerner is the place to go.

name: Blake Jones
text: Great customer service! Friendly staff. Always there to help with any questions or concerns. Large selection of plants, stone, and sod

name: Bernard Doug Cook
text: I live adjacent to them, my apt community's (my) back yard backs up to their work area & M-F oftimes til 10:30 p.m., it's waahh, waahh, waahh, w/their forklifts going night& day!

name: Dwaine Segers
text: Good $ @ great peoply very helpful

name: Rodney Griffin
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff

name: Jordan Boston
text: Great products

resp.text: Thanks Jordan for your review! We appreciate your business and thank you for shopping local!

name: Freddie Clark
text:
I bought 8 pallets of Bermuda and centipede sod for a seawall, they cut if fresh when you order it, the staff is friendly, courteous and knowledgeable about uses of the sod.
If I needed sod, this is the place I would go next time.
Only downside may be you having to pick it up yourself if you don't have time to wait for delivery.

name: Wesley Marner
text:
Absolutely wonderful. Fair prices. Everyone is very friendly, helpful and happy. Ms. Sue in the office, the load drivers, the workers in the field all to a 'T' fit this description! Efficient too!

Dr. Wesley Marner

name: Sam Richardson
text: Great service and great sod, would buy again.

name: Dan Mason
text: Very nice employees and product was excellent quality.

name: Michael Morris
text: Fast and friendly  service !!

name: Pat Phillips
text: Some of the best turf.

name: Flowers World
text: Great service and people

name: C Taylor
text: Helpful and knowledgeable employees. I have been here often. I actually pass up another improvement store to come to this one. Always have what I need and if they don't they will direct me where to go. The first time I came to this store was when we first moved to an area 35 miles from this store. I needed a Christmas tree. The Christmas trees were having a tuff year because of the drought. They replace the tree with a bigger one because I had to drive so far to come back. Super nice folks. I will continue to drive here for my home improvement needs.

name: Tracy Wyatt
text: Helpful people wonderful place to shop and they care about vets only one thing i have a promblem with is the garden center their plants are not taken care of and the empl oyees are familar with plants.

name: Mark Singleton
text: Found everything I needed except hosta plants

name: Jessica H
text: Good it's a mobile home park that rents out lots for mobile homes clean quiet friendly an there are 2 single wides I'm unsure of but look empty no one is every there.

name: James Parsons
text: Good sir...friendly staff

name: Ron “Yogi” Terry
text: Old Surfside Sod Farm is now Hugghins Sod Farm 344 Faye Dr, Cropwell, AL 35054

name: Jessie Rutledge
text: Good people

name: Jonathon Harp
text: Great people

name: Silver Vechain
text: Best sod farm!!!! Bought 9 pallets of centipede 2 weeks ago. Ladies where awesome in the office and delivery was right on time. Driver dropped the pallets exactly where I needed them. Two weeks have gone by, sod has rooted and lines are just about non visible. If you need sod... BECKS is where you need to go. Thanks to all the Becks team for providing a quality experience...

name: Geneva Burton
text: The best in the business! Very friendly, helpful and professional staff. This is the third home in which I have used scrap grass from Beck’s Turf to complete my lawn.

name: Mangus Wallace
text: Great products and great people.  Wayne and Jimmy Bassett are outstanding, never a problem with anything and I have been a customer for 20 years.  They always stand behind their products.

name: Josh Smitherins
text: I first went with Discovery Bermuda grass from Beck's.  It ended up not being the wonder grass that it's advertised to be, with much of it "mutating" into regular Bermuda.  It is a newer grass and I'd recommend staying away from it until it is time-tested.  However, Beck's gladly replaced all of the grass (I was doing the labor) when I showed them the problems a couple of months later.  They saw that I had been taking care of the grass very well and that the problems were not caused by me.  I went with Emerald Zoysia for the replacement grass in July of 2018 and it has been doing great since then.  Every bit of it survived the winter.  I did no weed control this Spring and very few weeds were able to root because the grass is so dense.  This grass is so lush and looks so good that multiple neighbors have stopped to ask what kind of grass it is.  I'm very happy with my purchase and the service from Beck's.

name: Coty Chambers
text: Great, friendly staff. Always quick service. Hands down my favorite place to get sod.

name: Rufus Professional Services & Landscape
text: Beck's is a great company. we use them for all of our sod jobs. From the office staff to the delivery driver, they all go out of their way to make sure you have a positive experience.

name: Maria Macksoud
text: Ordered 3 kiwis in one gallon containers.  Received bareroot and freshly grafted plants.  Male scion graft was not attached to rootstock and loose in box.  Unknown if female scions will graft. Contacted The WildLife Group of Beck's Turf immediately and received unsatisfactory response.  After canceling payment and contacting BBB, I was able to resolve dispute and received a one gallon potted plant.

name: ldrc85
text: Great people very helpful and turf quality is very good.

name: Shahari Pierce
text: They always have a great selection of plants and flowers. The deals aren't bad. I do wish they would take better care of the clearance section. When I go, a lot of them are usually knocked over and in dire need of water.

name: Maxine Bailey
text: Nice plants, plenty of seeds on display. Didn't find fingerling potatoes. Guess their spring supply of flowers will be in soon.

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text: They not only did not have what i wanted in stock. but they also had a sales agent in the garden center who absolutely had no knowledge about plants whatsoever. Nor was she willing to get off of her lazy ass to help a customer look either. She just sat there at the register and pointed to a section where she think it might be and began to say how they had them last week but dont know what is or isnt there now. Im like: uhh but you work here and you dont know what you have in stock of the main area where you work..smh

name: Teresa Davis
text: Great place to shop excellent customer service

name: Mary Reese
text: Nice, good prices

name: jamacia rudolph
text: Awesome flowers

name: Michael Thomas
text: Awesome guys. Super fast service, great customer service, great sod at a great price.

name: Dale Ray
text: One of the two pallets of sod I bought,  looked like remnants! Fell apart. 😞

name: Danielle Hassett
text: I was looking up nearby sodding farms and out of all of them, gulf coast sodding was by far the most helpful. I had a list of questions and he was so nice to answer them all very politely. Very knowledgeable and great customer service.

name: Louise Myers
text: Mr. John and his employees are excellent

name: Jody Andrews
text: Great customer service and the Bermuda looks great!

name: Frank Bowden
text: I ordered 5 pallets on May 18 for a scheduled delivery on May 21. Grass never came. It’s June 3 and grass still hasn’t been delivered. Rain has been an issue; however, not once has anyone from the company called to give me any update about my order. They never called to reschedule a delivery, never called to tell me the order couldn’t be filled because of rain, never called to let me know they’re sorry for the delay and are working to fill it. Nothing. I’ve had to initiate every conversation with them since placing my order. I called yet again June 1, was told they were getting orders ready (weather has been great) and would call me back about a delivery time. Still no word, 3 days later. They’re the only supplier around me that carries centipede, so I’m more or less stuck. I just expect some modicum of communication. Delays happen, but just keep your customer informed of what’s going on.

name: Granny Sandy Pouncey
text: It's a beautiful place on the corner of US Hwy 80 and County Road 11 in Lee County, Alabama.

name: alex chapman
text: Great quality and great pricea and the owner Brad Edward's great owner. Terry and jason have bad customer skills and are  snappy towards the customer.

name: mike green
text: Bought 3 pallets of Bermuda grass and its growing good.

name: Mark Gallagher
text: Loved the guys, help me out and have great grass.

name: Patrick Pate
text: Great sod farm Mr.Baker good people

name: Demarcus Wisdom
text: Good job

name: Samantha Hopkins
text: Going inside  the gardening center my first impression  was  the plants on the outside were not listed properly, several  perennial were under annuals and one plant had a arm of ants in it, next the stepping stones were very limited, I was looking for the octagon shaped one no luck, and the two hump barrier stone for flower beds were only in red which is disappointing, some of the plants were a little high considering the condition, also I'd love to know the name of some that happen to be in a planter assortment, left  me wondering.  I didn't like that some were very little detail on the information label but we do have Google  so I can't  complain too much. The cashiers seem to runaway if a customer comes to pay it was very unprofessional and also a waste of my time having to go find both cashiers "helping" customer, one literally was just watching.

name: Kyndall Reynolds
text: The garden center attendant was very knowledgeable of the products and helpful in us choosing a zero turn mower, bagger, and tiller.

name: Barry “Baw” Williams Sr.
text: Awesome!very helpful workers who can help you and know what they talking about too!

name: SandiB
text: Bought a new lawn mower on sale. Was $249 on sale for $186. Troybilt

name: Lora Benson
text:
Cashier was very courteous to her own kind.
Let some guy that just walked up go before me in line. Never ask how I was today like the other patrons whom she had full conversation with. But I did ask her how she was. No-one to help load or unload. All common for this location. Makes you want to drive 10 miles out of the way to Lowes.

name: Juanvinetta Elliott
text: Didn't  have everything I needed but I did get somethings

name: Paul Burnette
text: They didn't have the part that I was trying to find.....

name: Robert Turner Sr
text: Everything were nice and clean. Everyone we're frendly, speaking, wanting to help.as usually. Thanks.

name: elonzo taylor
text: Very neat...found what I was looking for with no problem.

name: Steven Dillon
text: Had what I needed and great price

name: Ron Terry
text: Nice place to visit

name: ohms0704
text: Good

name: Amanda Kidney
text:
Bought my decorative egg rock from them. It turned out beautiful.
Bought sod from them, it thrived.
Thought I'd save $25 on my next sod purchase and bought from another supplier in Mobile,  I regret it. The other sod I got is sickly and struggling, the pieces were falling apart as we tried to lay them.
The extra $25 per pallet is well worth it at woerner for healthy and thriving sod. (Centipede)

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and do hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Johnny Williams
text: Very well stocked. The staff was extremely helpful. I will be back for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Chad kiper
text: Great products. Friendly employees. A+

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Pamela Waleri
text: Monday delivery. Very good company to work with.

name: Andrew Carstarphen
text: Great service firm the guy that loaded my car with the items I purchased

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Ivan Martinez
text: Beat place to get sod in the area and they offer military discount!

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad you had a great experience and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Kim
text: Always a-1 service with smiles...always enjoy my trips there.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. We are so happy that we made your experience at our store a good one, customer service is a top priority for Woerner Turf. We hope you visit us again soon!

name: B C
text: Built a deck and walkway at my house last fall. David and the crew in Mobile helped with materials and advice. I got a great deal on some cut stone, sand, gravel, dirt, beach pebbles, and sod. Planted a flower bed in a galvanized trough and used the gravel for drainage. Built the walkway with the cut stone and used the beach pebble around some of the bushes. The grass took some time since I planted it in the fall, but it came out great in the spring. I will definitely be back for my next DIY project.

resp.text: Thanks for the detailed review, B C!

name: Michael Thompson
text: I’m a concrete contractor that uses these guys from time to time. They are a bit expensive, but I don’t mind paying for good service and quality products. We have purchased gravel, wall blocks, pavers and stones from them in the past. I always recommend them to customers for any of their personal landscaping needs. I went in to purchase some pea gravel and when I reminded the girl at the front desk that I should get contractor price, she was extremely rude. I probably would have went ahead and got an account, but she was so rude and disrespectful I never had a chance. Her name is Carla and I suggest someone in management teach her manners. I’ll use other stores for my products and not recommend them anymore if this is how they could be treated. By the way, I can go a bit further and get gravel from one of the trucking companies for half the cost.

resp.text: Michael, We are sorry about your experience at our store. We hope that you will give us another chance later down the road.

name: Benjamin Stout
text: Very very poor way of doing business! Today makes the second time this week that I have tried to purchase a large amount of rock from you and was not successful. I waited in line before you were open only for you to help others that came way after me first. I waited over 2 hours the other day and still was not helped. I will no longer do business with you and I will also no longer suggest you business to others. If you dont want the business close the location instead of doing business the way you are.

resp.text: Benjamin, We are sorry about your experience at our store. We hope that you will give us another chance later down the road.

name: Ewing Lawn Care
text: We have been using Woerner for many years and have always been satisfied with the quality of materials, as well as the superb customer service.  The employees are always friendly and give excellent advice on the products they sell.  I'm always impressed with how the employees are hustling to load materials for customers, as this is very rare to see these days!

name: Dante Piccini
text: This place has some great sod, I would highly recommend getting sod from them. Also any question about sod, pavers, insecticides, watering schedules, they are very friendly and helpful in answering any questions I had. Steven, Carla, and all the guys inside and those helping to load outside are very friendly and good people. I'm happy to do my business with them and will continue to do so knowing that their expertise and products are very good. Even if you are not sure about something, I would recommend going in person or calling them, they are very helpful. 5/5 for me.

name: david street
text: Always professional and courteous service - and very "veteran-friendly". Always ready answer any questions. I highly recommend them for any yard or gardening needs. Thanks to you all... Regards.

name: Scarlett Harrison
text: As a landscaper, this is the only place I will get my sod and landscape products! The quality is amazing! The staff is super friendly and extremely helpful! I’ve been a customer for over 15 years and counting! 😊

name: Nate Crabtree
text: Great staff, help is always helpful. Materials are top notch at a good price with great selection. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Nate. Glad to help you.

name: Matt Jones
text: Great office staff. Materials are pretty good. I've gotten some rough looking sod here a few times but that's the only complaint. I go here alot.

resp.text: Thank you, Matt. We do try to do our best on quality control, so we apologize for any that has been not to your or our standards. See you again soon!

name: Sheila Vickery
text: We purchased over $7,000 of grass last March. We now have numerous weeds and crab grass instead of the centipede we paid for. Would not recommend them or ever use them again.

resp.text: Sheila, we do apologize. We do not have a warranty on our grass especially over a years time just because there are some many things that we do not have control over once it has left our field. Have you contacted our store? We would like to talk with you, Do you mind if we reach out to you?

name: Christina Carr
text: Great service.  Great product.   Always has what I need.  My go to place for all of my landscape needs.

resp.text: We are glad we are able to help you!

name: Ryan Ludvik
text: They are always super friendly, have great selections and prices for premium dog food, and though my dogs are both 80lbs of hugs and kisses, they're always accepting and don't mind. Anytime someone needs dog food or lawn items, I always suggest Woerner's!

name: Ross Hatcher
text: This is a really neat store if you're into landscaping.  I could easily spend enough money here to make my wife pretty angry.  I've bought sand and gravel here recently, and the prices seem very fair.  They also got me in and out pretty quickly.  On my last trip to buy gravel, the load got pretty heavy and made my trailer tires look pretty deflated.  The young guy who loaded it then had me follow him to get some complimentary air from their compressor to make sure I got home safely.  Great service!

name: kim nelson
text: Great Service and friendly staff. They were very knowledgeable about what products I needed for my lawn.

name: j Wayne
text: Our company Quality sod and lawn care has been using woernrs for over 20yrs always good service

name: Matthew Jenkins
text: I have purchased many loads of gravel, sand, and rock from them. They have always been friendly and helpful and the price is right. I have been to many places like this around the area and Woerner beats them all in service, selection, and price.

name: Deeanna Smith
text: I picked up "clean long leaf straw" for a new customer. Well, that was a lie. Loads of trash and straw that was old and very brittle. I even took pictures. Called to speak to mgr. He was very rude. He said he sold 1500 bales a week and hadn't had a complaint. I will never go there again. Lowes has better pinestraw.

resp.text: Hey Deanna, we are sorry to hear the experience and purchase was not acceptable. We will follow up and find a resolution soon.

name: John McCabe
text: I frequent this store for sod and pinestraw mostly.  They always have better service and superior products than their competitors.

name: David Vincent
text: Everyone I come in they are very helpful and polite

name: Bill Huber
text: I buy some sod and dyed pine straw here several times per year.  They always have what I need and the staff is always friendly and helpful.

name: Chase Nelson
text: The absolute worst turf supplier in the area.  I purchased a pallet of grass a while back. After it was picked up and delivered to my home where it was laid in the area prepared, I discovered that more than half the grass was already dead and falling apart. This was the worst choice!

resp.text: Chase, we do apologize for any previous experiences you have had with us. We are under new management at this location. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to change your mind about our business. And again we are sincerely apologetic.

name: Scott Griffith
text: Purchased a load of pea gravel. The service was prompt, professional, and the price was reasonable.

name: Half Time
text: Great staff

name: Shay Rivers
text: Wow! I love this place!

name: Hunter Walker
text: Great place

name: Matthew Blackmon
text: Great service

name: David Pham
text:
(Translated by Google) It sells all kinds of building stones, people can come here to choose from the price is very good better than homedepot and low here. You may get a discount when you buy a lot. 👌👌👌

(Original)
Nơi đây bán tất cả các loại đá xây dựng mọi người có thể đến đây lựa chọn thoả mái giá cả rất tốt tốt hơn homedepot và low tại đây. Có thể bạn sẽ được giảm giá khi mua nhiều. 👌👌👌

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are glad you had a great experience and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Cary McDaniel
text: Great people to work with, very easy to do business. Bill is s great guy. Really appreciate a good business like this.

name: Chris Tarantino
text: Great supplier of sod and affordable.

name: Joan McGough
text: I purchased a pallet of sod and put in down myself.   I did not get one ant bite!!  The staff was friendly and dependable. Excellent customer service. A+++++

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Mrs. McGough!

name: Camdyn Carmichael
text: Used Rolling O for my sod at my house! Excellent customer service and very professional!

name: Greg Wilkins
text: Bill is a awesome guy

name: Randall Hunt
text: Great to deal with!

name: James Giles II
text:
This company is the best! John was a super professional and followed thur with everything he promised. It is so nice to not only find the quality of a product but also a company that came thur with price and delivery and did everything they promised with a smile.
What a pleasure to do business with!

name: Mike Kapotsy
text:
Sod was 10% cheaper than Baldwin, looked great and was delivered promptly.

Thanks!

name: nicholas west
text: Professionalism at it’s finest! Great Customer Service and these people knows how to treat customers!

name: Michael Durand
text: We here at Habitat for Humanity of the Mississippi Gulf Coast have been using Driskell Turf Farm for 10+ years. They provide a quality  product at affordable prices. Their customer service is outstanding ***********

name: Pearl Richardson
text: They always treat you as family.

name: Kelley Douglas
text: Good quality turf.

name: Cara Waite
text: Friendly staff, great prices and haven't got a  bad pallet of sod yet. Highly recommend

name: Brian Graves
text: Awesome turf farm real friendly staff and they have the best sod around for the best price!

name: kenneth johnson
text: Very friendly people I think they are truly God's people.

name: Digital Rep
text: Very high quality sod and great customer service!

name: abraham orr
text: OK

name: Mollie Newsome
text: I like this place because it's a garden Center! I love to be around growing things. The staff are very helpful and seem to know what they're talking about.

name: Arlene Dean
text:
We have shopped here several times & have found what we needed nearly every time. Most recently a gentleman helped us in the plumbing department & knew more about the issue we were having than the so called plumber we hired (that came to our home twice & still didn't fix the issue).
The water refill tube the Home Depot employee opened for us to test, and sold to us, fit perfectly & solved our problem.
We also purchased our holiday tree & holiday greenery at this location.  Nick, the helpful young man that trimmed & wrapped the tree for us, did a perfect job. We have lived in a variety of cities and states and this is hands down our favorite Home Depot location.

name: Scamuel Jones
text: This place is a total loser.  I could not find two common plants I was looking for in the lawn & garden.  Then I clicked to "chat" and was told I was #1 in the queue and then no one ever chatted!  I would suggest not even wasting your time at Home Depot for anything.  Try Lowe's or local nurseries, since these people totally IGNORE their customers!

name: Mason
text: Helpful staff but they often don't have what I'm looking for.

name: Amy Clement
text:
I live just down the street from this Home Depot and EVERY time I go into this store, I can never find anyone to help me.  It looks like a ghost town at the front of the store.  Are you under staffing this store, or are the employees hiding in the back?  I will say that I mostly come to this store after 5pm usually.

I thought it was important to let you know this because if things do not improve, I will just go across the street to Lowe's where they have always been more than happy to help me.  Your store is my neighborhood store, and I want to see you succeed and not go under because of poor management decisions with either hiring bad employees or not paying your staff enough to care about the customers.

Thanks!

name: T Denton
text: I purchased garden soil for blueberry plants.

name: Monika Askew
text: Had to load 40 bags of mulch by myself.  I told the cashier I would need help but he didn't call anyone.  Meanwhile, there were 2 guys loading pine straw and didn't offer to help.

name: Christa Lackey
text: Green Valley Landscaping made our back yard landscaping surrounding our pool look beautiful! They did a wonderful job, was prompt,  and completed everything perfectly to make our yard look wonderful!

name: Austin Johnson
text: The workers were great. They loaded mulch quickly and safely. I will be going back for more!

name: randall burton
text: Very helpfull & nice employees!! Variety of fresh vegetables and Greenaries...

resp.text: Hi Randall! Thanks for your review. Thanks for noticing our produce is fresh!

name: Paula Jo Scott King
text: Neat cool nursery raw peanuts yea. The staff are helpful Vicky told me about th he prim rose..

name: Thomas McGill
text: Good selection and very competitive prices. While prices are good, they aren't easily found on the plant.

resp.text:
Youre right! We'll get better.
Ken

name: Lisa Cantrell
text: I've driven past this place for years. I'm so glad I finally stopped and checked it out! I've been 3 or 4 times in the last 2 months. I've bought flowers(annuals and perrineals) fruit, baled hay, bagged hay, everything I've gotten has been top notch, excellent quality. The staff are exceptionally helpful, friendly and professional. This is 1 of my new Favorite places.

name: Shannon Jordan
text: Nice place.  Great selection!

name: virginia wages
text: awesome variety of plants and delicious foods. only complaint is that almost all of the food and a lot of the plants have plastic packaging so it's hard to be zero-waste if you want certain things. prices are a little high but always worth it because the plants always thrive. the honey is delicious.

resp.text:
Hi Virginia! Thanks for taking the time to review us and we're glad you notice our work in getting a lot of variety in our plants and working to get high quality and local goods.

We will give your feedback to our vendors and suppliers and see how we can be more green in the Green Valley.

name: Ro bn Barb
text: Very nice but no help

resp.text:
Thank you for your visit. We are struggling mightly to have staff on the yard to help every customer. Call me if i can ever help you personally.
Ken
256-648-1065 cell

name: Julie Helton
text: Best place to buy your plants

name: Steve Moates
text:
BEWARE! There are two separate businesses in Green Valley: the market and flowers and the landscaping.  You can judge the flowers for yourself and should get a good quality product.  I would recommend Porters just across the river for a much larger selection.
Now the BEWARE.  I hired Ken Irby to do my landscaping.  His crew did a good job.  As soon as the job was done and the sod laid I was very satisfied.  THEN IT RAINED.  I took pictures of the washed-out sod to the business and showed it to one of the landscapers.  He immediately said they did not put pins in the sod so it washed away.  I then went into the office and showed MR. IRBY.  He said he could fix it for over $1000.
I stated that since it was his workers' error it should not be that much.  He and I agreed to $800 to fix.  I know.  Why should I have to pay anything? As of today, November 4, 2020, I have not gotten responses from e-mails or calls.  I still have a mess and have waited too late to resod because MR. IRBY did not keep his word.  IF YOU DEAL WITH THIS MAN GET IT IN WRITING AS HE IS NOT TO BE TRUSTED.

In response to Mr. Irby.
You try and make yourself look like you will take care of a problem you created. (And charge me $800 to do so).  I REMIND YOU.  I came by your business and left a message, I called you,  left a message, I texted you and you did not contact me at all.(I can send copies)  You had my phone number, email and text and YOU INVITE ME TO CALL YOU.  I HOPE PEOPLE SEE THROUGH YOUR RESONSE THAT YOU WILL TAKE CARE OF us.  Please do not worry about the problem I will take care of it.

resp.text:
Steve,
Happy to get to your home and get this right.
Ken
256-648-1065 cell

name: Kim Sullivan
text: Beautiful selection of plants

resp.text:
Thank You!
Ken

name: nswinters87
text: Great employees, friendly, knowledgeable, helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and the review!

name: Jeff Gibbs
text: We looked at their website for their hours, it shows they are open till 6 but they close at 5. We wasted two trips trying to buy a Christmas tree because their hours are wrong on their website.

resp.text:
Sorry Jeff. we'll fix that. Thank you for letting us know. My apologies.
Ken Irby-owner

name: Jon Goggans
text: Good folks.  Buy a lot from them and they are good as gold

resp.text: Hi Jon! Thanks for your review and we think you're pretty great, too!

name: Rick Chapman
text: Great place to go for plants and vegetables  The people are great

resp.text: Hi Rick! We're glad to have your review. We always look forward to seeing you in!

name: Timothy Whalen
text: Quality merchandise and helpful staff. Better prices than you would think.

name: Robert Blanchard
text: The store great and the bread they sell is so good but this review is for the service. I do construction management and just completed a Taco Garage in Florence.  We had a couple smaller landscaping projects there as it was an existing building. Ken was quick to come and check out what we had. His prices were fair and the service was great. I'm looking forward to working with Green Valley in the future.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Shelly Colvin
text: I direct events for Billy Reid in Florence, Alabama and Green Valley is an incredible partner that elevates our event environments in a major way. Not only do they supply stunning greenery, but they maintain them by watering and servicing on time deliveries and pick ups. Their staff also has a great understanding of venues, event flow, and can provide ideal placement of their inventory without direction. When I book Green Valley to be a part of an event I don't have to worry about anything. They totally take care of making a venue look beautiful. We are grateful to work with them year after year.

name: Ken Blankenship
text: Just finished second project with Green Valley Nursery and a third to be starting soon. They have been very friendly and knowledgeable. Will recommend them highly to anyone

name: Natalie Gregg
text:
Paid $950 for a job poorly done because I was immediately threatened by the owner Ken Irby that I would be handed over to collections, although before the job was even started he personally told me I didn’t have to pay until I was happy with the job.

First, he made an appointment to install a gravel driveway at our rental house on Monday. He (Green Valley Nursery & Landscape) never showed up that day. I questioned him, & he acted like he was doing me a favor by fitting me into his busy schedule. Told me he’d send a bobcat over to finish the job right then... I asked if the gravel was even at the job site, & he replied, “I have no idea! Guess I better check.” Wow! If that doesn’t tell you how unprofessional they are, I don’t know what does? Said he might be able to get the job done on Tuesday. I finally had him nail down a time for Friday, because I like a guaranteed job when I am paying for it. I felt like I had to babysit them to make sure the job would actually get done. Finally, the driveway was installed by people who are supposedly professionals. They literally just dropped off gravel & spread it out a bit. I’m not a professional landscaper, but all the research we found said that the gravel needed to be plate compacted through the process. He said they don’t do that, & he never promised me that. I only expected him to professionally & properly install a driveway... sorry, that’s what I thought they were. Professionals. Nope. He refused to fix the job, even though I was promised I wouldn’t have to pay until I was happy, & he would make it right. He told me he wanted to wash his hands of me, & wished I’d never bothered him. The gravel in this driveway is so loose that the first rain will wash it all out, it’s uneven, has a poorly graded slope that makes it hard to enter the drive without scraping the bottom of your car, & my husband couldn’t fit his Jeep in the carport anymore because there was so much gravel under it. They refused to fix it at the present cost, & said they would plate compact it for another $500. He said, “I’ll bill you, don’t pay it, & I’ll send you to collections. We’ll let the law handle it.” Unbelievable & awful experience. My husband & I could’ve done this job properly for as little as $700, but we decided to hire “pros” instead, & now, we are out $950, & it’s not even done right... meaning more expenses for us now. Do your research before hiring Ken Irby.

name: Heather Malone
text: I have made a few purchases with these lovely people. I used to deliver cut firewood here, they are very friendly and are highly experienced in their line of work... All produce, decor, and flowers are kept fresh and beautifully displayed.

name: Danny Blevins
text:
Ken and his guys are great.
Super service to every detail.
High quality products and work

name: Clinton Baker
text: Green Valley re-landscaped every bed at my house, and it looks fantastic. They provided a variety of ideas for revitalizing our overgrown beds at varying price points. Once we decided what we wanted, the crew did quick work exactly to plan and didn't leave any trash or debris behind.

resp.text: Thanks Clinton!! We really appreciate your review. We are so happy to hear you're pleased with your yard.

name: Shei Darksbane
text: Best nursery in town! Great produce and plants, friendly and knowledgeable helpful staff, nice market items, and fresh local honey!! Also great prices!! I'm so impressed and will be back for more garden plants!!

name: Scott Brown
text: Great company. Nice and very helpful people. They do great landscaping and are one of the few places you can get true "fresh" vegetables.

name: Melissa Young
text: Great selection of fruits, vegetables, flowers and plants.  The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable.  They also have a great selection of homemade goodies & locally grown honey.

name: Susan Nash
text: Being in Florence for a few months, I have discovered Green Valley Nursery and love going there. My favorite is that I find Chilton County peaches there. But their cantelopes are so sweet and juicy!

name: Sandra Gilmour
text: Just moved to the area. Went for the first time last week. Beautiful produce, healthy, lovely plants and a great staff of knowledgeable young people. Will return for some of those beautiful hydrangeas.

name: Jessica Mccarley
text: They have a great variety of vegetables and fruits, and they even guarantee the freshness and awesome taste of their products!!! Customer service is great as well!!!

name: Ray Methvin
text: Love the fresh produce and really appreciate the great customer service. Wonderful place to stop and shop. Always something interesting!

name: robin fuqua
text: I love it. Always wanted to go here but I thought it was expensive. It wasn't. Nice fruits and good hospitality. Will be back. With family and friends.

name: Donna Summerford
text: They have Amish cabbage for .99 a head.

name: Red Robin
text: Always been a great experience at Green Valley! Great quality produce and products.

name: Peggie Lazenby
text:
I love Green Valley Nursery!  The Shoals Master Gardeners  appreciate them and all they do for our communities.
Thank you !
Peggie Lazenby

name: Michelle Zackey
text: What a sweet place! The people are so friendly and helpful and the store and garden center are stocked w beautifully displayed produce and plants.

name: Chance Robinett
text: Very friendly staff, great product! Super convenient!

name: Sara Moseley
text: Great nursery that has healthy plants and lots of garden and home gifts as well.

name: Anna Bighta
text: Great variety of good-looking veggies!

name: Stephanie Coleman
text: Love this place!  The best tomatoes!

name: Kayla White
text: They have great flowers, fruits and vegetables.

name: Travis Harvey
text: Delicious  fruits and vegetables and service is excellent

name: Michelle McGeorge
text: Cory, states: “Bermuda is Bermuda, no difference between common and hybrid”.

name: Timothy Taylor
text: My wife and I were looking for something to replace the old plastic edging around our flower beds and some fresh soil to work into the beds. No problems there. We got ready to check out, and Home Depot decided to do their best Walmart impression...9 or 10 customers waiting to check out, only 1 register open.😖  After about 12-15 minutes in line, the second register finally opened.

name: Diane Lewis
text: Love the garden center, beautiful flowers they had a sale on potting soil, good deal but no one there to help I have a bad hand and needed help with soil but couldn't find any one

name: Bobby Gilliland
text: very good in every way.

name: Bryan McElroy
text: Home and garden building supplies tools.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Fantastic experience. Super helpful guy (and beautiful resident black cat) who exchanged, without problem, a plant I bought a few weeks ago that perished. Much more room than some garden centers, making it easy to get around with wide aisles. Lots of variety in annuals and perrenial plants and all the rest, pots, rocks, soil and anything for outside. Wish they would keep the garden center gates open when the store is open for that last hour shopping errand.

name: Jared Persons
text:
Just purchased a big grille!!!!
Home depot employee from lighting DEPT , stopped what he was doing to help me wheel grille to register and then outside to my trailer to help load it up.
He could of easily sent me on a wild goose chase to find someone in the lawn and garden section, but he didn't.....That's hard to find these days in retail stores...

name: Bit Bucket
text: It was good for us today! Because of the freezing weather, herbs were knocked down to 3 bucks. Some of them were not hurt.

name: lovesickforone
text: Loved thier garden dpt.! Great plants...good variety

name: Christopher Brown
text: Drove from Bayou la Batre they had only part of what I needed but they just out. Big selling I belive

name: Judith Word
text: The garden department staff & all employees and management here have been very friendly and helpful

name: Russell Pilling
text: I live in Theodore and went to Lowe's first waited forty minutes to be told by the man in lawn and garden he would be there soon waiting for another fifteen minutes went to Home Depot got a riding mower and gone in fifteen minutes that's faster than Jimmy Johnson LOLOL

name: hector macias
text: ,,love shopping here everytime a make a delivery,,
